author: Ariel Sophia Bardi
title: Without safe homes or jobs, Italy's Roma fear coronavirus impact
description: Following quarantine rules is near impossible for many Roma, who do not have financial backup or job security.
content:
Rome, Italy - Weeks into Italy's national quarantine and social media has been overtaken with rosy footage of sunset balcony serenades. 
But vulnerable communities are still struggling with the country's strict lockdown measures.
At a Roma camp on Via Salvi… [+6007 chars]
